WorkflowInfo.Name: Find zombie users
WorkflowInfo.Description: Search for users who didnt login to the domain for the last 120 days
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:MemorySet;Assembly=MemorySet, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ADListOU;Assembly=ADListOU, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ResultSetFilter;Assembly=ResultSetFilter, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:ADUserLoggedInDate;Assembly=ADUserLoggedInDate, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:DateDifference;Assembly=DateDifference, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" VariableValue="Zombie Users List" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="False" VariableName="UsersList" x:Name="CreateReport" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /> <ns1:ADListOU IsValid="True" x:Name="adListOU1" HostName="AD-SRV" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:00:00" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DisplayName="AD List OU" Recursive="{x:Null}" Path="\Users" Password="" OUName="" Description="Active directory List OU." HostId="-2" TypeName="ADListOU" UserName="" /> <ns2:ResultSetFilter IsValid="True" x:Name="GetUsers" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="ResultSet Filter" VariableName="%adListOU1%" Description="Filter a Result Set" TypeName="ResultSetFilter" FilterStatement="Type = 'User'" /> <ns3:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="TotalUsers" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%GetUsers%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="GetUsers" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns5:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%TotalUsers%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns6:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="GetUserName" ColumnNumber="2" ResultSet="%GetUsers%" RowNumber="%ExitWhile1%" ResultSetName="GetUsers" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns7:ADUserLoggedInDate IsValid="True" x:Name="adUserLoggedInDate1" ADUserName="%GetUserName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:00:00" HostName="AD-SRV" DisplayName="AD User Last Logged in Date" Path="\Users" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Active directory user last logged in date." HostId="-2" TypeName="ADUserLoggedInDate" UserName="" /> <ns8:DateDifference IsNowSelected="1" x:Name="dateDifference1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" FirstDate="" SecondDateFormat="MM/dd/yyyy h:mm:ss tt" DisplayName="Date Difference" Description="Returns the date difference between two dates." ReturnFormat="Days" FirstDateFormat="" TypeName="DateDifference" SecondDate="%adUserLoggedInDate1%" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="Check_Result"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="higher_than_120_days"> <ns9:ReturnValue Value="120" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType=">" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& > 120" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" VariableValue="%GetUserName%" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="True" VariableName="UsersList" x:Name="UpdateReport" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="lower_than_120_days"> <ns9:ReturnValue Value="120" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="<=" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& <= 120" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> <ns4:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Zombies Users Report" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="SendReport" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=windows-1252" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 9.00.8112.16434"></HEAD>
<BODY><PRE><PRE>%UsersList%</PRE></PRE></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process provides an easy and efficient way to create a report of users, that didnÂ’t login to the domain within a specific time frame. Using this template, you can maintain your AD on a regular basis while keeping it organized and updated.
